name: Cyber Security & Data Protection in Pharma & Healthcare Congress
content: Oxford Global are proud to present the Cyber Security & Data Protection in Pharma & Healthcare Congress, 25 - 26 September 2019, London, UK. Over 450 attendees representing global pharmaceutical organisations, leading biotech companies and internationally renowned academic institutions. Over 20 presentations and case studies focusing on overcoming key vulnerabilities and threats in the Pharmaceutical and Healthcare industries, including presentations on Information Security and the use of Blockchain to secure ‘omics data. View Agenda: https://bit.ly/2JHsONN Including 2 interactive streams: • Analysing & Overcoming Vulnerabilities & Threats in the Cyber Security Landscape • Strategies & Novel Technologies for Maximizing Data Protection Co-located with the 17th Annual Pharmaceutical IT & Data Congress, 3rd Annual Artificial Intelligence in Drug Development Congress and SmartLabs & Laboratory Informatics Congress. For further information on the congress and to receive prices and booking details, please contact me at a.saez@oxfordglobal.co.uk or call +44 (0)1865 248 455\. Live Webinar Key Learnings From Blockchain Projects In Europe Presented by Anca Petre, Co-Founder & Chief Operations Officer, 23 Consulting Monday 1st July 2019 | 9:30am BST
